title: Loadingscreen bug
body:
Whenever a game starts i cant join till the game itself started. So when its like 1:30 ill be on the map thus too late. HALP
Already tried repair and that fixxed it for 2 games.

replies.body: You might be having some driver or even hardware issues that's failing to quickly render your game.  My recommendation would be to go over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to make sure your rig and game are in a healthy state.  Make sure to also check our recommended specs guide in case your pc might not be meeting requirements.  Let me know if you have any questions!
